activities: Informz is an integrated e-marketing solutions company that enables personalized and targeted communication. The Informz solution provides customers with the tools to easily and cost-effectively promote their brands; stay in touch with contacts; generate and analyze data about their markets; manage information about the people who are important to their organization as well as receive valuable feedback.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
